Package model.staticUnit

package model.staticUnit
  • Class Summary
    Class
    Description
    CeilingUnit
    The CeilingUnit class creates ceiling units to be used for the world.
    It's a static object which has the same image as wall and floor.
    A ceiling unit is a unit shaped like a square that is treated as a ceiling, with collision on all four sides.
    The ceiling collides with any kind of game object.
    Even if a game object is on top of a ceiling, the game object will be pushed down.
    FloorUnit
    The FloorUnit class creates floor units to be used for the world.
    A floor unit is a unit shaped like a square that is treated as a floor replace by imageview which has the same image as wall,
    with collision on the top, left, and right sides.
    The floor collides with any kind of dynamic object.
    When an enemy is bubbled, the enemy will still be stopped by a floor unit above it.
    StaticObject
    Static object is wall unit ceiling unit and floor unit which all of them cannot move.
    WallUnit
    The WallUnit class creates wall units to be used for the world.
    A wall unit is an unit shaped like a square which replace by the image view wall with different colors,
    with collision on all four sides.
    The wall collides with any kind of dynamic object.
